warning.title: Important: Dual Account Required
warning.message:
Mammotion Cloud only allows ONE active session per account. To use this app, you must:

1. Create a secondary Mammotion account
2. Share your mower to this secondary account from the main app
3. Use the secondary account credentials here

Keep your primary account for the mobile app.
